div.p: Boys Basketball Team! Amazing Season Boys! GO REDMEN
The kids exceeded expectations with helping make, decorate, and packing treats.
Bringing home a First Place win!
Anna Hoffland represents Rib Lake in the Marawood Conference Honors Choir on Tuesday, Nov. 5th at Spencer.
